name: MissileCommand
description:
Missile Command is a 1980 Game on Atari 2600. 

This versions is a one day project .

You will have to protect your 4 citys by launching deffence missil to intercepet the ennemies missile, you make point for each ennemis missile destroy , et defence missile left at the end of the game but also lost point want losing citys.

Github :https://github.com/popote1/MissileCommanderProject
